title: No train service between Choa Chu Kang and Bukit Panjang due to a train fault

updates.text: [BPLRT] CLEARED: Normal service resumed. Free bus services still available till1425hrs.
[BPLRT] No train service betwn #ChoaChuKang to #BukitPanjang due to a train fault. Free regular bus & bus bridging services are available.
